entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 63
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 5 Photos of the special event 1990-0328 Public Program, Jaipur, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 5 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 7 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Collection 1990.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
